attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An election should be held at the earliest possible date after 4 June. To enable the public to pass its verdict on the expenses crisis gripping Parliament. 

All members of parliament to sign a pledge on their conduct, requiring them to publish details of all their office, travel and staffing costs as well as their contacts with lobbyists. 

All members of parliament to stand for re-selection with their local party prior to a general election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
